---
title: "Data Import Script"
format: html
---

```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(dplyr) 
```


```{r}
read_html("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_most-subscribed_YouTube_channels") |>
  html_elements("td:nth-child(2)") |>
  html_text2() -> most_sub

tibble(most_sub) -> most_subs

slice(.data = most_subs, 1:50) -> most_subss
```
